Q-0-1.title: Internal Error
Q-0-1.message_template: An internal error occurred. This is a bug in Quarto.

Q-1-10.title: Missing Required Property
Q-1-10.message_template: A required property is missing from the YAML document.

Q-1-11.title: Type Mismatch
Q-1-11.message_template: The value has an incorrect type (expected one type, got another).

Q-1-12.title: Invalid Enum Value
Q-1-12.message_template: The value is not one of the allowed enumeration values.

Q-1-13.title: Array Length Constraint Violation
Q-1-13.message_template: The array length does not meet the minimum or maximum item constraints.

Q-1-14.title: String Pattern Mismatch
Q-1-14.message_template: The string value does not match the required pattern.

Q-1-15.title: Number Range Violation
Q-1-15.message_template: The numeric value is outside the allowed range or not a valid multiple.

Q-1-16.title: Object Property Count Violation
Q-1-16.message_template: The object has too many or too few properties.

Q-1-17.title: Unresolved Schema Reference
Q-1-17.message_template: A $ref reference in the schema could not be resolved.

Q-1-18.title: Unknown Property
Q-1-18.message_template: An unknown property was found in a closed object schema.

Q-1-19.title: Array Uniqueness Violation
Q-1-19.message_template: Array items must be unique but duplicates were found.
